references.paper_title: SwiftBrush v2: Make your one-step diffusion model better than its teacher
references.reason: This paper presents the state-of-the-art one-step diffusion model distillation technique, which SNOOPI builds upon and improves.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This is a foundational paper for high-resolution image generation using diffusion models, providing essential background for understanding the methods used in SNOOPI.
This paper introduces classifier-free guidance (CFG), a crucial technique that SNOOPI enhances and adapts for improved stability and control in one-step diffusion.

references.paper_title: Hyper-SD: Trajectory segmented consistency model for efficient image synthesis
references.reason: This paper proposes a method for efficient image synthesis using diffusion models that is relevant to the one-step distillation approach used in SNOOPI.

references.paper_title: One-step diffusion distillation via deep equilibrium models
references.reason: This paper explores one-step diffusion distillation which is the main focus of SNOOPI and offers an alternative approach that SNOOPI improves upon.
